settings.text: Get a FREE $40 Gift Card by sending us a short video review of BioSource Nutra products!

BioSource Nutra will send you a $40 Gift Card to our store! Just film a 20 to 50 second video review of our product(s)! AND as an added bonus, we’ll also add you to our monthly draw to win a bundle of our best selling products!

settings.code: Get Started Now

settings.text:
STEP 1

Grab a Smartphone or a Tablet that can record video. (iPhone, Samsung, ipad, etc.)

custom_css: body {display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; margin: 0;}
.btn {display: inline-block; padding: 10px 20px; text-decoration: none; background-color: #94cc09; color: #fff; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 16px;}

settings.text:
STEP 1

Grab a Smartphone or a Tablet that can record video. (iPhone, Samsung, ipad, etc.)

STEP 2

Record your video review (Must be at least 20-50 seconds long).

We suggest you ask a friend or family member to record you…(You can then treat them to a coffee when you receive your gift card.)

VIDEO REQUIREMENTS:

TO QUALIFY FOR THE GIFT CARD, YOU MUST INCLUDE
THE FOLLOWING 3 ELEMENTS IN YOUR VIDEO:

1.) Mention our company name: BioSource Nutra

2.) Clearly show Your Face and the BioSource Nutra Product

3.) Review both the Product and Your Shopping Experience

Questions you can answer:

  • What was your life like before using BioSource Nutra's product?

  • What was your life like after using the product?

  • If you were to recommend this to a friend, what exactly would you say?

  • What was the reason you were looking for this product?

  • Did you lose weight with the product? How much did you lose and over what period of time?

  • What is the most positive (or negative) experience you've had with this kind of product (BioSource Nutra's or not)?

STEP 3

Email us your video or click here to upload it. 

(From the device you recorded it on)

TO SEND VIA EMAIL

  1. USE SUBJECT LINE:
    BioSource Nutra Video Review

  2. SEND YOUR VIDEO TO: support@biosourcenutra.com

    (you can use "WeTransfer" app for large video files)

    Save time and upload your video by clicking the upload button below...

settings.code: Upload Your Video Here
